Package com.atakmap.android.importexport

Class ExportFilters

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.importexport.ExportFilters
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExportFilter
    public class ExportFilters
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExportFilter
    Provide a late binding filter capability e.g. to filter items within a MapOverlay when the entire MapOverlay was selected for export

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  ExportFilters.BoundingBoxFilter
      Filters objects which are not in the specified bounding box
      static class  ExportFilters.TargetClassFilter
      Filters objects which are not exportable to the specified target class
      static class  ExportFilters.UIDFilter
      Filters objects based on inclusion in a list of UIDs
